title: Sound On: Inflation, 2022 Redistricting Map
itunes:title: Sound On: Inflation, 2022 Redistricting Map
description:
Bloomberg Government Congress reporters Emily Wilkins and Jack Fitzpatrick co-hosted the show. Guests: Congresswoman David Price of North Carolina, Bloomberg Politics Contributor Jeanne Sheehan Zaino, Bill McGinley, Principal at The Vogel Group, and Greg Giroux, Bloomberg Government Congress and Elections reporter.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
